ski.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
ski.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: a ski resort  (=where people can go skiing)
ski.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a long thin narrow piece of strong material, fastened under a small vehicle so that it can travel on snow
ski.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
ski.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: We skied down to the village of Argentière.
